name: Akron Systems: Backrooms Demo
description:
**Some versions of Chrome make the mouse skip around in WebGL mode - if that's the case for you consider another browser or downloading the standalone version.**

AKRON Systems

Established 1989

 

P.O. Box 21337

Test Site Alpha 002

Mare Necatris, Moon [Earth]

 

We are a global life sciences and research company harnessing science for human good. Every day, our mission is to improve technology and improve lives.

Our scientists, engineers and researchers advance science, technology and innovations to make real, meaningful differences in our customer's lives. Using world-class diagnostics and testing to improve our understanding on the [REDACTED] ether, we're always rethrining ways to make the [REDACTED] zone more accessible.

AKRON Systems was founded in 1989 by  S.Switz and funded by viewers like you.

Welcome to Specimen Testing Area #001

Item#: STA-001

Object Class: Keter

Special Containment Procedures: No physical interaction with S-01 is allowed at any time. All physical interaction must be approved by no less than two-thirds vote of the Specimen Management Council. Any such interaction must be maintained on a Class-5 Security site

Descriptoin: S-01 is a perpetual resident of its  current containment facility. S-01 is known to write and leave notes scattered througout the testing area. The collection and combining of notes will provide the classified individual access to the next floor of its labyrinth.

Addendum:

"When I first encountered S-01 there was a stronge urge to drop on m knees and cover my face. It was a pretty weird feeling. I couldn’t resist it at first, but by looking away from it I was able to regain my control. The notes it would leave were very strange too.. When I combined them all I felt a sense that S-01 was delighted by my actions. Continuing on I fel ta sense of longing for it's gaze. I still feel it's pull as we speak.. [END VOICE RECORDING]"
